question: Which Indian Bank has partnered with Fiserv, for digitising its card issuance and processing cycle?
explanation:
Federal Bank, a Kerala-based private bank has partnered with Fiserv - a global payments and financial services technology solutions provider.
The partnership aims to digitise the card issuance and processing cycle completely. The bank will utilise the card management solution called “First Vision” of Fiserv. Fiserv would also support the Federal Bank for launch of its credit card.
